title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Phi-3, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, sharing, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to chat, stream, pull, delete models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector DB and RAG ingestion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, MAUI samples.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for 200+ models; submit via PR.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in threads; slash-command driven.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: GPT-CLI fork re-targeted to Ollama; chat, code, shell commands with history.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate with Tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.
